name: Salt Effect
description:
It's something I've done for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W11 2017. The theme was Could you pass me the salt, please?

So, I've come with the idea of throw some salt crystals through a river to hit a picnic blanket. And if you missed, you turned into a Attila guy because the salt tends to sterilize the ground.

I can't make more for the moment. The only things done are :
- the plot : ground, river (with animation), blanket (randomly spawn)
- put a crystal on the ground make the grass disappear and the salt too

But there is no throwing control or check for a victory.

To put a salt crystal, simply left click on the area you want.
